text: The Crown of Aragon was a joining of multiple titles and states in the hands of the King of the Crown of Aragon. In the 14th and 15th the land of Aragon covered most of present-day France and Spain. The political center was at Barcelona. ==References== Category:14th century in France Category:History of Spain Category:Former monarchies of Europe Category:15th century in France
title: Crown of Aragon
